name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Kaiba the Revenge
name_original: Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Kaiba the Revenge
description:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Kaiba the Revenge is a digital board game developed by Konami Computer Entertainment Japan. It came out on 30-03-2004. It was published by Konami. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Kaiba the Revenge is available on PC.
